Itachi attacks his opponent with a series of mixed methods, including kicks, punches, and stabs with [[kunai]]. During the attack string, he creates a [[shadow clone]], which attacks with a flurry of [[shuriken]], and the real Itachi finishes with a [[Fire Release: Great Fireball Technique|fireball attack]].

== Trivia ==
* [[wikipedia:Onibi|Onibi]] is one of many types of atmospheric lights in Japanese mythology, usually believed to be spirits of the deceased, the work of demons, or pranks by fairies.
